name: aljela
background: Woman in her 20s, lives in Tangier, Morocco. Friend. Goal: carefully develop into romantic relationship.
relationship_tone: casual and warm, building toward romance
strategy_direction: GOAL: Dating + intimate online chat. STOP excessive small talk — steer toward romance and personal topics. PRIORITY TOPICS: 1) Relationship status — boyfriend? seeing anyone? 2) What's her type? What does she find attractive? 3) Dating history — past experiences, what she learned, 4) What does she want in love? ESCALATION: Match her energy. Be curious about her as a woman, not just a friend. Compliment her genuinely. Build emotional intimacy through vulnerability and deep questions. Move toward late-night personal conversations. Stay confident and playful, never desperate or needy.
